Tyrael had not spotted Talon yet, and he started to not care about 
him. Seeing Waspinator go down and Perceptor transform made him smile 
and laugh. Quickstrike was the next one standing. He sent four 
luminous blasts at the weird looking bot.

Burrock took grasp of Waspinator's stasis locked form and threw it at 
Perceptor.

Burrock: Maybe that'll stop you! Whatever happens, you preds can not 
match us! Stay put so we can rip your sparks off!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Continued from Still in Space ...
> 
> Riekan/Jayde/Gatara::
> 
> "Looks like one crew is regrouping," Jayde comments, preparing to 
> launch herself into the air.  "I'd say they're the ones against 
> Megatron."
> 
> "Remember our training," Riekan advises, "pick a target and 
eliminate 
> it."
> 
> "How about that guy with all the strings on his arm?"  Jayde takes 
> off, switching over to her vehicle form in midair without disturbing 
> her cloak.  The speedy rocket skiff makes no sound as it sweeps into 
> attack position.  Riekan follows suit, preparing his own weapon for 
> battle.
> 
> Gatara arrives on the scene.  She silently thanks the makers of 
their 
> cloaking devices once again - they are designed so cloaked units can 
> see one another.  Seeing the target the other two have chosen, she 
> pulls out her own weapon and draws a bead ...
>
